definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Organic forms of amnesia are usually associated with dysfunction of the DIENCEPHALON or HIPPOCAMPUS. (From Adams et al.
sentences.chinese: 遺忘症的器質形式通常與間腦或海馬的功能障礙有關。

sentences.english: However, avoiding trauma of frontal lobe and thalamus was noted.
sentences.chinese: 避免額葉及間腦受損問題。

sentences.english: The diencephalon is located in the core of the brain.
sentences.chinese: 間腦位於大腦的中心位置。

sentences.english: ChAT-IR positive neurons were widely distributed in each nuclei of diencephalons.
sentences.chinese: 陽性神經元廣泛分佈於間腦的各核區內。
